answerText: The Piano Lesson[10] The Piano Lesson is by this African-American playwright, whose Pittsburgh Cycle includes the plays Ma Rainey's Black Bottom and Fences.
heading: ACF Regionals |2013 | Editors 1 | 1 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In this work, Old Sutter's ghost haunts the Doaker home. For 10 points each:  [10] Name this play in which Boy Willie and Berenice argue about the fate of the title instrument.
